title: Reese Witherspoon is twinning with older brother John in rare picture: 'Love you big bro'
text:
CLOSE Reese Witherspoon is expanding her social media presence, but like many parents nowadays, she needed a little help from her kids. FCCE

Reese Witherspoon is her big brother's biggest fan!

The actress, 43, took to Instagram over the weekend to share a rare picture of herself posing with her older brother, John Witherspoon, in honor of his birthday.

"Happy Birthday to my big brother who always volunteers to be my chauffeur when I’m in Nashville," Witherspoon captioned a selfie of her and John inside a car Sunday.

In the snapshot, the siblings showed off their near identical smiles while keeping it casual. The actress wore a black shirt and cap, while John opted for green plaid.

"He is also good at many important things like: setting up electronic devices, cleaning AC filters, smoking 5lbs of ribs for a party, and changing oil filters," Witherspoon gushed. "All of these skills are much appreciated by his Sister. Love you big bro!"

She joked, "P.S. I need help with my WiFi today... can you come over ?"

More: Reese Witherspoon learns TikTok dance moves from son and we're cry-laughing

Earlier this year, Witherspoon shared an epic throwback picture of her and John fashionably dressed at an amusement park.

"Happy #NationalSiblingsDay to the best big brother!" she wrote in April. "What's that saying? Fashion fades but family is forever?? 😂 Love you! ( did anyone else ❤️ ESPRIT ? )"

More:Reese Witherspoon reveals 'how to talk to your kids on Snapchat' and many moms can relate

description: Reese Witherspoon is her big brother's biggest fan! The actress shared a rare picture of herself and John Witherspoon in honor of his birthday.
